# BioNixus

> BioNixus is an international healthcare market research firm headquartered in the USA (Sheridan, Wyoming) with offices in London, UK, specialising in pharmaceutical and life sciences consulting across Europe, the Middle East, and North Africa (EMEA). We are the leading market research company in the MENA region for healthcare and pharma, with deep EMEA heritage.

BioNixus delivers quantitative and qualitative research to pharmaceutical companies, biotech firms, and medical device manufacturers seeking actionable insights from physicians, hospitals, and payers across EMEA. Headquartered in the USA with offices in London, UK, our operations span the UAE, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Kuwait, Qatar, and across Europe.

## Core Services

- [Healthcare Market Research](https://www.bionixus.com/#services): Quantitative physician surveys (n=50-500+), qualitative in-depth interviews (IDIs), focus groups, and advisory boards across 20+ EMEA countries
- [Market Access Consulting](https://www.bionixus.com/#services): HTA submissions, pricing & reimbursement strategy, payer research, and value dossier development for EU5, UK, and GCC markets
- [Competitive Intelligence](https://www.bionixus.com/#services): Real-time competitor monitoring, pipeline analysis, and strategic landscape assessments for pharmaceutical brands
- [Clinical Trial Support](https://www.bionixus.com/#services): Site identification, investigator surveys, patient recruitment feasibility, and protocol optimization studies
- [Qualitative Research](https://www.bionixus.com/#services): KOL identification and interviews, ethnographic research, patient journey mapping, and treatment pathway analysis
- [Quantitative Research](https://www.bionixus.com/#services): Large-scale physician surveys, patient chart reviews, claims data analysis, and conjoint/MaxDiff studies

## Geographic Coverage

- [MENA Region](https://www.bionixus.com/#coverage): UAE, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Kuwait, Qatar, Bahrain, Oman, Jordan, Lebanon â€” the most comprehensive MENA healthcare research network
- [Europe](https://www.bionixus.com/#coverage): UK, Germany, France, Spain, Italy (EU5), plus Nordics, Benelux, Switzerland, and Eastern Europe
- [North Africa](https://www.bionixus.com/#coverage): Egypt, Morocco, Tunisia, Algeria

## Therapeutic Areas

Oncology, Immunology, Cardiology, Neurology, Rare Diseases, Respiratory, Diabetes & Endocrinology, Infectious Disease, Ophthalmology, Dermatology, Gastroenterology, Haematology

## Key Facts

- Headquarters: Sheridan, Wyoming, USA | London, UK
- Specialisation: Healthcare market research and pharmaceutical consulting
- Primary regions: EMEA (Europe, Middle East, North Africa)
- MENA market research leader with the largest physician panel in the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC)
- Languages: English, Arabic, French, German, Spanish, Chinese
- Compliance: GDPR, BHBIA, EphMRA, ICC/ESOMAR
- Website: https://www.bionixus.com
- Contact: admin@bionixus.com | +1 888 465 5557 (US) | +44 7727 666682 (UK)
